alert.note: Alert for Lac Qui Parle; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lac qui Parle and northwestern Yellow Medicine Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Madison, or 24 miles west of Montevideo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Madison around 255 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dawson and Boyd. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 0 and 30. U.S. Highway 75 between mile markers 95 and 122. U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 98 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
